edu.biu.scapi.primitives.hash.bc

Class BcSHA224

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.hash.bc.BcHash
      • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.hash.bc.BcSHA224
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CryptographicHash, SHA224, CollisionResistant, HashSecLevel, SecurityLevel, TargetCollisionResistant

    public final class BcSHA224
extends BcHash
implements SHA224
    Concrete class of cryptographicHash for SHA224. This class wraps BouncyCastle implementation of SHA224.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BcSHA224()
      Passes the digest SHA224 of BC to the super class which does the hash computation.
